p: For L-Gln-lactam-SA ( 89), a panel of other cancer cell lines was tested for cell viability to give cytotoxic activities (IC 50) of 0.19–25.24 μM ( Table 2). Additionally, apoptotic staining and cell cycle/arrest assays were performed on LNCaP and PC3 cells for all aa-SA compounds. aa-SA-induced apoptosis and a shift of the cell cycle to the sub G0/G1 and S phases were observed ( Table 2).
